about.details:
Incorporated in May 1995, Usha Financial Services Limited is a non-banking finance company providing lending solutions to other NBFCs, corporates, MSMEs, and individuals, particularly women entrepreneurs.

The company also provides Electric Vehicle (EV) financing services. It offers a diversified range of financial products to individuals, body corporates, NBFCs, and MSMEs.

The company has an AUM of Rs. 30,695.76 Lakhs and a Net worth of Rs. 10,602.63 Lakhs. It maintains a CRAR of 33.03% and a D/E Ratio of 1.71.

The company has maintained long-term relationships with its lenders. As of September 30, 2024, the company's lenders included four banks and 15 NBFCs.

The company utilizes two distinct business models to generate revenue: (A) Retail Lending and (B) Wholesale Lending.

The product portfolio of the company consists of the following 

  • Loans to Other NBFCs and Corporates
  • Green financing/ electric vehicle financing
  • MSMEs, focusing on small entrepreneurs

Competitive Strength

  • Experienced management team
  • The company has strategic agreements with NBFCs and other entities, its business partners/correspondents, which are crucial for its retail lending business, providing access to extensive borrower networks.
  • The extensive customer due diligence procedures include multiple levels of checks and controls.

As of October 2024, the company had 43 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Usha Financial Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Usha Financial Services IPO is a SME IPO of 5860000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹98.45 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹168 per share. The minimum order quantity is 800.

The IPO opens on October 24, 2024, and closes on October 28, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Usha Financial Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Usha Financial Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Usha Financial Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Usha Financial Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Usha Financial Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Usha Financial Services IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Usha Financial Services IPO opens on October 24, 2024 and closes on October 28, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Usha Financial Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Usha Financial Services IPO lot size is 800, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,34,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Usha Financial Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Usha Financial Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Usha Financial Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Usha Financial Services IPO will be done on Tuesday, October 29, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, October 30, 2024. Check the Usha Financial Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Usha Financial Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Usha Financial Services IPO listing date is on Thursday, October 31, 2024.
